column1: '''The Tale of Tinúviel''' is the first chapter of ''[[The Book of Lost Tales Part Two]]''. It was one of the earlier versions of the story of [[Beren]] and [[Lúthien]]
column2: later revisited as the ''[[Lay of Leithian]]'' and ''[[Of Beren and Lúthien]]'' from the ''[[Quenta Silmarillion]]''.  Differences from the later version include the following:

column1: * The knife Beren uses to cut out the [[Silmaril]] is a kitchen-knife of Tevildo rather than [[Angrist]]
* Lúthien wears silver-white instead of sky-blue
